oai_dc:dc.dc:description: About the !khou, or water tortoise: it lives in water and is a rain's 'thing' (!khoa ka ||kerri-ssi !kau). 1) See also An account of the rain's things or '!khoa ka ||kerri-ssi !kau', 2) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !khou or water tortoise
